name: Bone Idle
description: Bone Idle is a short puzzle game in which you play the skeletal minion of a necromancer, In three minutes you must reach the Necronomicon for your master. This was our first go at making a 3d game, it was created in a week. I was the programmer and my extremely sexy friend lokidylan(https://lokidylan.itch.io/) was the artist.
